p: The pooled mean RRs of having been exposed to HCV infection are presented in Supporting Table S2 for any two combinations of the population epidemiologic categories. These pooled mean RRs are also shown in Fig. 2 relative to general populations, for countries with a generalized epidemic (Fig. 2A), for countries with a concentrated epidemic (Fig. 2B), and for the MENA region as a whole (Fig. 2C).
